text: Luzerne County is a county in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania. As of the 2020 census, the population was 325,594, making it the most populous county in the northeastern part of the state. The county seat and largest city is Wilkes- Barre. Other populous communities include Hazleton, Kingston, Nanticoke, and Pittston. Luzerne County is included in the Scrantonâ€“Wilkes-Barre Metropolitan Statistical Area, which has a total population of 567,559 (as of 2020). ==References== Category:1780s establishments in Pennsylvania Category:1786 establishments in the United States Category:Pennsylvania counties
title: Luzerne County, Pennsylvania
